hero.title: About HASCO Group
hero.subtitle: Excellence in integrated solutions across marine, logistics, and development sectors with 19+ years of proven expertise.

story.heading: Our Story
story.paragraph1: HASCO Group was established in 2005 to practice in the activities of integrated supply chain & logistics solutions.
story.paragraph2: HASCO Group has created an active ecosystem of maritime and logistics services: from ship agency and marine operations to freight forwarding and hospitality services across the Middle East and beyond.
story.paragraph3: With over 19 years of excellence in integrated supply chain and logistics solutions, HASCO Group stands as a trusted partner in Saudi Arabia's economic growth and development.

shipAgency.title: Ship Agency
shipAgency.description: Professional ship agency services providing comprehensive port operations and vessel handling with advanced maritime expertise.

shipping.title: Shipping (NVOCC)
shipping.description: Global shipping solutions and cargo management across international routes with comprehensive logistics support.

marine.title: Marine Operations
marine.description: Comprehensive marine services including consultancy, operations, and professional diving with state-of-the-art equipment.

hospitality.title: Hospitality
hospitality.description: High-quality hospitality, catering, and event management services with premium facilities and experienced coordinators.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.text: To deliver exceptional integrated solutions across marine, logistics, and development sectors, fostering sustainable growth and innovation while maintaining the highest standards of service excellence.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the leading integrated solutions provider in the Middle East, recognized for our commitment to excellence, innovation, and sustainable development practices.

cta.heading: Ready to Work With Us?
cta.text: Let's discuss how HASCO Group can support your next project with our comprehensive solutions and expertise.

hero.subtitle: From marine expertise to logistics, construction, tourism, and beyond — HASCO delivers world-class solutions that power the Kingdom's growth and global ambitions.

about.heading: About
about.description: HASCO has grown from a focused logistics provider into a diversified holding group. Based in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, we operate across Marine, Logistics, Construction, Shipping, Tourism, Hospitality, and Consultancy, supporting the nation's transformation under Vision 2030.

ceo.name: (CEO NAME HERE)
ceo.title: Chief Executive Officer
ceo.heading: A Message from Our CEO
ceo.note: At HASCO, we believe in the power of integrated solutions. Our journey from a focused logistics provider to a diversified holding group reflects the Kingdom's own transformation. As Saudi Arabia strides boldly toward Vision 2030, we're honored to contribute our expertise across marine, logistics, construction, and beyond. Every project we undertake is a testament to our commitment to excellence and our faith in the Kingdom's future.

destinations.label: OUR DESTINATIONS
destinations.subtitle: HASCO operates across key strategic locations throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

magna.name: Magna
magna.description: Magna represents HASCO's presence in the northern Red Sea region, supporting development projects and marine operations in this emerging area. Our services include logistics coordination and marine consultancy for regional infrastructure projects.

diba.name: Diba
diba.description: Located along the Red Sea coast, Diba is a key location for HASCO's marine and logistics operations, supporting coastal development and maritime activities in the region.

alWajh.name: Al Wajh
alWajh.description: Al Wajh serves as a strategic gateway for HASCO's operations supporting NEOM and Red Sea development projects. We provide ship agency, marine operations, and comprehensive logistics solutions for this rapidly growing region.

yanbu.name: Yanbu
yanbu.description: Yanbu is one of Saudi Arabia's most important industrial ports on the Red Sea. HASCO delivers full-spectrum port services, including ship agency, cargo handling, freight forwarding, and marine operations support for the petrochemical and industrial sectors.

kap.name: KAP
kap.description: King Abdullah Port (KAP) is a major container port north of Jeddah. HASCO provides comprehensive maritime services, advanced logistics solutions, and strategic consultancy to support regional trade and economic growth.

jeddah.name: Jeddah
jeddah.description: Jeddah is HASCO's flagship location and operational headquarters. As Saudi Arabia's premier commercial port on the Red Sea, we provide comprehensive maritime services, advanced logistics solutions, and strategic consultancy to support the Kingdom's trade and economic growth.

jazan.name: Jazan
jazan.description: Jazan Port serves the southern region of Saudi Arabia with vital industrial and commercial activities. HASCO offers ship agency, marine operations, and integrated logistics services supporting the Jazan Economic City and regional development initiatives.

khafji.name: Khafji
khafji.description: Khafji, located in the northeast near the Kuwaiti border, is an important oil and gas production area. HASCO supports offshore and onshore operations with specialized marine services, logistics coordination, and consultancy for the energy sector.

rasAlKhair.name: Ras Al Khair
rasAlKhair.description: Ras Al Khair is a major industrial hub on Saudi Arabia's eastern coast, home to one of the world's largest aluminum smelters and a vital port for mineral exports. HASCO provides comprehensive marine operations, logistics support, and port agency services to facilitate seamless industrial operations in this strategic location.

dammam.name: Dammam
dammam.description: Dammam, the capital of the Eastern Province, hosts King Abdul Aziz Port - one of the largest ports in the Arabian Gulf. HASCO provides comprehensive maritime services, freight forwarding, and supply chain solutions supporting the region's thriving industrial and commercial sectors.

footer.description: Excellence in integrated solutions across marine, logistics, and development sectors. Powering Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 with 20+ years of proven expertise.
